metadata.title: CVE-2020-22677 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in gpac 0.8.0. The dump_data_hex function inbox_dump.c has a heap-based buffer overflow which can lead to a denial ofservice (DOS) via a crafted input.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
